metadata.name: HackTool - SharpImpersonation Execution
metadata.comment: Detects execution of the SharpImpersonation tool. Which can be used to manipulate tokens on a Windows computers remotely (PsExec/WmiExec) or interactively

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\sharpimpersonation.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('sharpimpersonation.exe') OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' user:')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' binary:')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' user:')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' shellcode:')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' technique:createprocessasuserw')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' technique:impersonateloggedonuser')))))

output.summary: Detects execution of the SharpImpersonation tool. Which can be used to manipulate tokens on a Windows computers remotely (PsExec/WmiExec) or interactively
